name: The Long Shortcut
description:
A kid who was getting late to reach home decided to take a shortcut  which is close to his house. Will he reach or not ?

Discover the truth on the journey before the vacation starts

A PS1 stylized game.

This Game is the submission for BYOG 2022 and it was made in under 48 hours.

#BYOG  #BYOG2022

#gamedev
Do rate my game and have a great time

Thank you!



Controls

WASD - For Movement

Spacebar - To Jump

Hold Shift - To Run

Press E - To pickup Key and Interact with Door

**Headphones are required for better sound experience**

Credits

Textures were taken from texturespbr.

Other models were used from sketchfab.

Sounds were used from freesound.org
